items.sentence: We would appreciate if the council would stop vacillating and make a choice already.
My favorite smoothie is one made with green tea, frozen raspberries and blueberries.
It's irresponsible to leave someone to their own devices in the middle of a factory.
"A is equivalent to B" has the same meaning as "A is true if and only if B is true".
If you want something to be done right, sometimes you've just got to do it yourself.
To compete in a triathlon, you might be required to wear a wet suit during the swim.
If I could speak French, I'd be able to tell Tom everything I've wanted to tell him.
If there's something that you don't understand, please don't hesitate to contact us.
Quick! We need to hide the cookies before Tom gets home, or else he'll eat them all!
A man and a woman, who both had brown hair, were sitting at a table near the window.
